means: 指示性的，指导性的，指挥的

sentence.Network_en: Thanks to a new EU directive, insecticide labelling will be more specific.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据欧盟的一项新指令，杀虫剂的标签标注将更加明确。

sentence.Network_en: A new EU directive on maternity leave will come into force next month.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧盟的一项产假新政策将在下个月生效.

sentence.Network_en: The Supreme Warlord promulgated his infamous'scorched earth " directive.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位最高统帅公布了他那臭名昭著的实行 “ 焦土 ” 政策的指示.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 指令(directive)向容器提供关于JSP页面的总体信息。在JSP页面中，指令是以<%@开头，以%>结束的标签。
以下编译指示（ directive ）被许多编译器认可： 任何处于这两个编译指示语句之间的数据结构，将采用 n 字节的数据对齐方式。
命字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 命酒〖 ordersb.toplacewinesonthetable〗 命令〖 order;directive〗 命令〖 order;command〗.
Liran - 博客园 ... digital 数字的 directive (编译)指示符 directory 目录.

list.abs: ...的rgb改变了，注意这种情况只对索引的图有用，对于直接（direct）的图像，这个值是null，不过原理是一样的，注意保证saturation …
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... develop（ 开发，发展）； direct（ 指导，引导）； dynamic（ 动态的，力学的）…
七年级英语单词表 ... talk about 谈论;讨论;议论 direction 方向 unit 单元.
方字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 方外〖 Buddhist,Taoistmonks〗 方位〖 direction〗 方位词〖 nounoflocality〗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an adjective): from medieval Latin directivus, from direct- 'guided, put straight', from the verb dirigere (see direct)

entry.def: A directive is an official instruction that is given by someone in authority.

example.ex: Thanks to a new EU directive, insecticide labelling will be more specific.
example.tran: 根据欧盟的一项新指令，杀虫剂的标签标注将更加明确。

means.word_mean: 1. a pronouncement encouraging or banning some activity;

sentences.sentence: "the boss loves to send us directives"

means.word_mean: 1. showing the way by conducting or leading; imposing direction on;

sentences.sentence: "felt his mother's directing arm around him"
"the directional role of science on industrial progress"
